com.rpgcraft.api

Class RenderAssist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rpgcraft.api.RenderAssist

  • public class RenderAssist
extends java.lang.Object
    Some methods which are usually in GuiIngame, but since we don't have
    direct access when rendering in HudItem, you may need to use these.
    Author:
    maxpowa

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float zLevel
      Controls render "level" for layering textures overtop one another.

      static void bindTexture(java.lang.String textureLocation)

      Draws a color rectangle outline with the specified coordinates and color.
      Color must have all four hex elements (0xFFFFFFFF)
      static void drawVerticalLine(int par1, int par2, int par3, int par4)

      • drawUnfilledRect

        public static void drawUnfilledRect(float x1,
                                    float g,
                                    float x2,
                                    float y2,
                                    int color)
        Draws a color rectangle outline with the specified coordinates and color.
        Color must have all four hex elements (0xFFFFFFFF)
        Parameters:
        x1 - First X value
        g - First Y value
        x2 - Second X value
        y2 - Second Y Value

      • drawTexturedModalRect

        public static void drawTexturedModalRect(float x,
                                         float y,
                                         float u,
                                         float v,
                                         float width,
                                         float height)
        Draws a textured rectangle at the stored z-value.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Axis position to render the sprite into the GUI.
        y - Y-Axis position to render the sprite into the GUI.
        u - X-Axis position on the spritesheet which this sprite is found.
        v - Y-Axis position on the spritesheet which this sprite is found.
        width - Width to render the sprite.
        height - Height to render the sprite.

      • bindTexture

        public static void bindTexture(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation res)

      • bindTexture

        public static void bindTexture(java.lang.String textureLocation)
        Binds a texture, similar to the way renderEngine.bindTexture(String str) used to work.
        Parameters:
        textureLocation - Path to location, you should know how to format this.

      • drawRect

        public static void drawRect(float g,
                            float h,
                            float i,
                            float j,
                            int color)
        Draws a solid color rectangle with the specified coordinates and color.
        Parameters:
        g - First X value
        h - First Y value
        i - Second X value
        j - Second Y Value
